name: Unicorn Game
description:
The Unicorn Game is a lovely, bright, fun and massively addictive game. With beautiful backgrounds and very cool happy music, this is a game which is perfect for kids and family of all ages.

The aim of the game is to tap on the Unicorns before they disappear. The further you get, the harder the game becomes with more and more Unicorns appearing on the screen.

The Unicorn game is modern day twist on the old classic: Whack-a-Mole, but with beautiful images and backgrounds. Once you start playing, you are guaranteed to get hooked!
